ActorTalk: Customers, please take a number and wait in line. We appreciate your cooperation.
We have a reservation.
Let me check... Oh! Your turn just came up. Your table's ready on the second floor. Right this way, please.
Besides the new dishes, is there anything else you'd like to try, Commandant?
These two are highly rated. Lots of people say they're unique and have a really refreshing flavor.
Then let's go with your picks.
Here are your dishes. Enjoy the meal.
There's more food than I expected.
Turning simple ingredients into something so special... Kowloong's culinary skills really are something else.
Try it, Commandant.
...A photo?
It's not every day we get a feast like this. Let's capture the moment.
Do we both need to be in it?
Of course! Look at the camera—
...Okay. Is this angle all right, Commandant?
Cheese.
Photo's done. Let's eat.
Commandant, you've got some sauce on your lip. Let me wipe it off.
Let's enjoy these dishes together, Commandant.
Really? Hold still, let me take a look...
The server mentioned that some of these dishes taste even better when paired together.
Which ones? Let's try them.
Like this one and this one, Commandant—
(Lucia lifts the food with her chopsticks, and you take a bite. The blend of flavors spreads and deepens as you chew.)
Pairing different ingredients like this creates a whole new flavor. Looks like the chef had that in mind all along.
Want to try a few other combinations, Commandant?
Want to try it, Lucia?
Sure.
So? How is it?
It tastes really good. If we get the chance, let's try cooking Kowloong-style dishes together sometime.
Got any recommendations, Lucia?
I'll have one of everything.
Want to take a photo together first?
(Sample the dish)
Yep. Say cheese—
Thanks, Lucia.
Think there's some on the other side too...
I think these few would go great together too.
I'm getting a bit full.
All right, then... I'll order one of each.
